title: Love
description: Boy meets girl, falls in love, and lives happily ever after. This is NOT that story.In the City of Angels, Robert is living the American a beautiful home, a stable job, and a loving girl. His life functions with clockwork precision. And yet, happiness still eludes him.Scouring the pages of the classical books in his den, Robert hopes to find the answers to the complexities of romance, love, and life. Though, in his search, he cannot help but question if the answers he seeks can really be found in fiction."Highly recommended book from a talented writer. I thoroughly enjoyed it!" "An out of the ordinary love story!"
author: Jin Okubo
